item.title: How WP Stealth Note came to be
item.dc:creator: admin

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: a:5:{s:10:"video_type";s:7:"youtube";s:10:"audio_type";s:10:"soundcloud";s:10:"aside_type";s:4:"text";s:11:"aside_embed";s:303:"I would see that people would come to my blog, spend 1-2 minutes on the blog... and then leave without purchasing anything. Initially, I was confused because I was promoting products that typically had a high conversion rate and included high-quality information. Why weren't most of my visitors buying?";s:11:"status_type";s:4:"text";}

item.title: Battle Deadline - The Last Chapter
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
This is an art school where students bring their animation to life. In order to graduate each students must create an animated short within given amount of time. But meeting that deadline is not a simple task.
This is my final film at Calarts as BFA 4. Bunch of thanks to everybody who helped and supported me along the way make this film possible!
Check out other great shorts here!

Donec eu libero sit amet quam egestas semper. Aenean ultricies mi vitae est. Mauris placerat eleifend leo.

item.title: Woo Ninja
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Pellentesque habitant morbi tristique senectus et netus et malesuada fames ac turpis egestas. Vestibulum tortor quam, feugiat vitae, ultricies eget, tempor sit amet, ante. Donec eu libero sit amet quam egestas semper. Aenean ultricies mi vitae est. Mauris placerat eleifend leo.

Donec eu libero sit amet quam egestas semper. Aenean ultricies mi vitae est. Mauris placerat eleifend leo.

item.title: Premium Quality
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Pellentesque habitant morbi tristique senectus et netus et malesuada fames ac turpis egestas. Vestibulum tortor quam, feugiat vitae, ultricies eget, tempor sit amet, ante. Donec eu libero sit amet quam egestas semper. Aenean ultricies mi vitae est. Mauris placerat eleifend leo.
item.excerpt:encoded: Pellentesque habitant morbi tristique senectus et netus et malesuada fames ac turpis egestas. Vestibulum tortor quam, feugiat vitae, ultricies eget, tempor sit amet, ante. Donec eu libero sit amet quam egestas semper. Aenean ultricies mi vitae est. Mauris placerat eleifend leo.
